Name: Explosive Device
Describe: Blows up the Space Resources being captured

Name: Energy Drink
Describe: The speed of the ongoing capture increases to 2x

Name: Disruptor
Describe: The next capture will not detonate Explosive Devices

Name: The Midas Touch
Describe: Space Resources being captured will be converted to Gold Meteorites of the same size

Name: Metallurgy Guide
Describe: Gold Meteorites grant 50% more Resource Points in the next stage

Name: Extraction Guide
Describe: Star Gems grant 50% more Resource Points in the next stage

Name: Workout Guide
Describe: The speed of the next capture increases by 30%

Name: Lucky Guide
Describe: Forgotten Supplies grant 50% more Resource Points in the next stage
